mapper.sql: select s.id, s.title, s.status, s.visible_all, s.deadline, s.remark, s.pinned, s.pinned_time, s.create_by, s.create_time, s.update_by, s.update_time, s.del_flag, (case when sa.id is null then 0 else 1 end) as submitted_flag from tb_survey s left join tb_survey_answer sa on sa.survey_id = s.id and sa.user_id = #{userId} and sa.del_flag = '0'
mapper.select:
s.del_flag = '0'
and s.status = #{q.status}
and s.title like concat('%', #{q.title}, '%')
and (s.deadline is null or now() <= s.deadline)
and (s.deadline is not null and now() > s.deadline)
and ( s.visible_all = 1 or exists ( select 1 from tb_survey_scope sc where sc.survey_id = s.id and sc.del_flag = '0' and ( (sc.scope_type = 0 and sc.ref_id in (select role_id from sys_user_role where user_id = #{userId})) or (sc.scope_type = 1 and sc.ref_id in (select dept_id from sys_user where user_id = #{userId})) or (sc.scope_type = 2 and sc.ref_id in (select post_id from sys_user_post where user_id = #{userId})) ) ) )
order by s.pinned desc, s.pinned_time desc, s.update_time desc, s.id desc
select s.id, s.title, s.status, s.visible_all, s.deadline, s.remark, s.pinned, s.pinned_time, s.create_by, s.create_time, s.update_by, s.update_time, s.del_flag from tb_survey s where s.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_survey ( title, status, visible_all, deadline, remark, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, del_flag ) values ( #{title}, #{status}, #{visibleAll}, #{deadline}, #{remark}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, '0' )
mapper.update: update tb_survey set status = 2, update_time = now() where id = #{id} and del_flag = '0'
update tb_survey set deadline = #{deadline}, update_time = now() where id = #{id} and del_flag = '0'
update tb_survey set pinned = 0 where pinned = 1 and deadline is not null and now() > deadline and del_flag = '0'
update tb_survey set pinned = 1, pinned_time = now(), update_time = now() where id = #{id} and del_flag = '0'
update tb_survey set pinned = 0, update_time = now() where id = #{id} and del_flag = '0'
